translations: 执行，执行程序；主任参谋，副舰长

sentences.sentence: Nokia dumps CEO, turns to Microsoft exec.
sentences.translation: 诺基亚新的CEO，前微软执行总裁。

sentences.sentence: Why does it exec the real rm utility?
sentences.translation: 它为什么执行(exec)实际的rm实用程序呢？

sentences.sentence: Using the exec family of system calls.
